page.title: 17Industry in South Birmingham
page.content: LAND ROVER This is the largest industrial company in our block. There are at present two sites being used. The main factory is in the S.W. corner of the block whilst the engine works is in the west. This second factory will be phased out by the end of 1985 with the work being transferred to the Solihull plant. CANAL Some industry is found on the banks of the canal. A sawmill and a building suppliers are examples of industries that have been there since the canal was built although the canal is no longer used for transportation. WYNFORD ROAD INDUSTRIAL ESTATE This is a small industrial estate in the N.W. corner of the block. The estate contains four manufacturing and two service industries employing about 250 people.
